participant_1.background:

i am fascinated with ghosts.

i want to get married again.

content.text: Hey! Not much, just got back from a long day of work.
Oh that sounds tiring. I just got back from dance lessons with my boyfriend.
How was it? I love dancing!
It was great, we learned some new steps. I love dancing because it's so fun and expressive.
I totally agree! Dancing is the best way to let go of stress.
I also love that it's a great workout. I've been trying to get in shape more, and dancing is really helping me.
That's awesome! I'm glad dancing is working for you.
Thanks! What do you do for fun?
I love playing music and tending to my garden. I'm also really close with my family, so I enjoy spending time with them.
That sounds really nice. I'm not much of a gardener, but I love playing music too.
What kind of music do you play?
I play the guitar and I sing. I'm not very good, but I have a lot of fun.
That's awesome! I love the guitar. It's such a beautiful instrument.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
